# {{<fa street-view>}} Short Bio

Debayan Koley has recently submitted his doctoral thesis at the Department of Statistics, Banaras Hindu University, and is currently employed as an adjunct faculty in the Department of Mathematical Sciences, School of Basic and Applied Sciences at Adamas University. He holds a master's degree in statistics from Visva-Bharati University and a bachelor's degree in statistics from Midnapore College (Autonomous). His primary research interests lie in reliability theory, statistical inference, and Bayesian computation, with a focus on developing methods that are both theoretically robust and practically applicable. Beyond academics, Debayan is a voracious reader across genres and an avid film enthusiast. In his leisure time, he enjoys creative writing and playing the amateur violin.
